113  enum State
114  {
115  Initial = 0,
116  Stopped = 1,
117  Running = 2,
118  };
119 
120  // Flags controlling whether the sensor needs to be stopped (or reopened) when changing settings
121  static const int ReconfigureClose = 3; // Need to close and reopen sensor to change this setting
122  static const int ReconfigureStop = 1; // Need to stop the stream before changing this setting
123  static const int ReconfigureRunning = 0; // We can change this setting without stopping the stream
124

126  void advertiseROSTopics();

140  UVC_XU_CTRL_RGB = 9,
141  };

143  enum tof_process_num
144  {
145  TOF_SET_EEPROM = 0x0000,
146  TOF_SET_DEPTH_RANGE = 0x0002,
147  TOF_SET_THRESHOLD = 0x0003,
148  TOF_SET_NR_FILTER = 0x0004,
149  TOF_SET_PULSE_COUNT = 0x0005,
150  TOF_SET_LD_ENABLE = 0x0006,
151  TOF_SET_IR_GAIN = 0x0009,
152  TOF_SET_ERROR_STOP = 0x0010,
153  TOF_SET_ERROR_CLEAR = 0x7F01,
154  TOF_GET_DEPTH_RANGE = 0x8002,
155  TOF_GET_THRESHOLD = 0x8003,
156  TOF_GET_NR_FILTER = 0x8004,
157  TOF_GET_PULSE_COUNT = 0x8005,
158  TOF_GET_LD_ENABLE = 0x8006,
159  TOF_GET_DEPTH_CNV_GAIN = 0x8007,
160  TOF_GET_DEPTH_INFO = 0x8008,
161  TOF_GET_IR_GAIN = 0x8009,
162  TOF_GET_TEMPERATURE = 0x800A,
163  TOF_GET_LD_PULSE_WIDTH = 0x800B,
164  TOF_GET_VERSION = 0xFF00,
165  TOF_GET_ERROR_INFO = 0xFF01,
166  };
167 
168  enum tof_eeprom_mode
169  {
170  TOF_EEPROM_FACTORY_DEFAULT = 0x0000,
171  TOF_EEPROM_UPDATE_CURRENT = 0x0001,
172  };
173

179  RGB_SET_SHUTTER_CONTROL = 0x0003,
180  RGB_SET_COLOR_CORRECTION = 0x0005,
181  RGB_GET_AE_MODE = 0x8001,
182  RGB_GET_BRIGHTNESS_GAIN = 0x8002,
183  RGB_GET_SHUTTER_CONTROL = 0x8003,
184  RGB_GET_COLOR_CORRECTION = 0x8005,
185  };
